model.unit

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.unit.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Defines an object to handle levels, experience, and levelups.
    Author:
    Jonathan Trudeau
